alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Halifax County through 845 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Boston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Boston... Halifax... Turbeville... Scottsburg... Hitesburg... Cluster Springs... and Staunton River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
